name: Under the Lights
description: Desperate to feel normal, a boy with epilepsy goes to prom knowing the lights will make him have a seizure.

review.author: Kirpianuscus
review.heading: in prom night
review.reviewBody:
The prom night . In the lady restroom , a girl tries to calm down after breakup. In the next cabin, a boy, on floor, in unconventional tenure.

Their talk, discover each other, vulnerabilities, mutual help, fair portrait of their vulnerabilities.

He got eiylepsy and the night of prom is the most provocative exercise to try be like others. And he is right .

At the end, two good points - the pure gratitude for the director,Miles Levin, affected himself by epilepsy for this total inspired manifesto and for beautiful performances of Alyssa Jirrels and Pearce Joza.

In the last minute, the message of Miles Levin is the piece making complete this powerful , honest, direct and gentle crafted short film , reminding the sufference of others near us.
